name: Parasync
description:
This is a 2d puzzle platformer where you can change the colour of the platforms.

As an additional challenge you have to move with two squares at the same time and as such you have to finish at the same time. You can stay on the same coloured platforms as the square's colour and a special "spiky" platform on which you can always stay on.

Good luck, have fun!

Controls:
a - left
d - right
w - jump
space - change platform colour
